metadata.title: CVE-2020-1735 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in the Ansible Engine when the fetch module is used. Anattacker could intercept the module, inject a new path, and then choose anew destination path on the controller node. All versions in 2.7.x, 2.8.xand 2.9.x branches are believed to be vulnerable.

criterions.comment: ansible package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
